title: Moderna recalls vaccine batch after foreign substance found in CDMO-made vial—again
author: Fraiser Kansteiner
description: The specter of particulates has forced another recall—this time on Moderna's massively successful COVID-19 vaccine Spikevax—and the latest pull isn't contract manufacturer Rovi's first brush with c | The specter of particulates has forced another recall—this time on Moderna's massively successful COVID-19 vaccine Spikevax—and the latest pull isn't contract manufacturer Rovi's first brush with contamination, either.
